snippet: ALLOCCA--Michael A. April 3, 1934-January 14, 2016. Beloved husband of Rose, father of John and Michael, and grandfather of Rose and Victor. Longtime account executive and vice president in title insurance; dedicated volunteer at St. Vincent's Hospital and other facilities. Visitation 2pm, Funeral Mass 3pm on Thursday, January 21, at St. Francis Xavier Church. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ALLOCCA, MICHAEL A
